Rules Committee Resolution H.Res.503 Reported to House.

House Agreed to Amendments Adopted by the Committee of the Whole.
Failed of Passage in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 150 - 263 (Record Vote No: 160).

official_title: A bill to provide for a temporary increase in the public debt limit, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure failed of passage in House, roll call #160 (150-263)) Increases until June 22, 1984, the temporary public debt limit by $30,000,000,000. Increases the limit on long-term Government bonds to not more than $200,000,000,000 (currently, $150,000,000,000). Grants the Secretary of the Treasury authority to obtain miscellaneous services and facilities and to incur certain administrative expenditures.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a temporary increase in the public debt limit, and for other purposes.
